Malice:

As soon as Myrmidon's back was turned to him, Malice lunged in.  He dropped the chain sword along the way and caught the blade in the left side of his chest.  It would stop at his harder internal skeleton, abut it put him in very close proximity to his opponent.  With powerful claws he sprang in to grab and tear at Myrmidon.



----- Original Message ----
From: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...>
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, April 22, 2008 6:37:13 AM
Subject: Re: Black Fortress


--- Robert Riley <chiyohakuryuu@ yahoo.com> wrote:

> Malice:
> 
> Malice caught the blade with the side of his face and growled. He
> grabbed the blade tip in his free hand and pulled it free. His chain
> sword retracted and made a powerful, fast thrust, launching the chain
> again. 
> 
> "You arn't even trying to kill me. Go out and kill some Maximals.
> When your done come find me again."

Myrmidon spun his blade up to catch the launching blade as he twisted,
but was not quite fast enough. The blade caught him along the shoulder
ripping a gash along it. 

With a slight grunt Myrmidon continued the twist away from the blade,
using his own blade to move its flightpath aside. As his spin came full
circle Myrmidon lashed out with a quick slice of his own with his
sword/batleth with deadly aim and ferocity!

"Fool! Had you not started this, that is exactly what I would be
doing!" Even as he spoke the wound on his shoulder was begining to
knit.

Preston
(Myrmidon)
